tool_description: Access real-time and historical FIFA world rankings effortlessly for seamless integration into your applications.
name: World Football Ranking
title: World Football Ranking

api_list.name: Current Ranking
api_list.description: Provides the current FIFA World Ranking. Users can make a simple request to get the most recent ranking of football teams.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-football-ranking.p.rapidapi.com/current-ranking.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-football-ranking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-football-ranking.p.rapidapi.com/current-ranking.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ranking by Date
api_list.description: Allows users to retrieve the FIFA World Ranking for a specific date by providing the ranking ID obtained from the historical rankings endpoint. This is useful for accessing rankings on past dates.

api_list.name: Historical Rankings
api_list.description: Returns the historical data of FIFA World Rankings, including dates when the rankings were published along with their unique identifiers (IDs). This allows users to track changes over time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-football-ranking.p.rapidapi.com/historical-rankings.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-football-ranking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
